ComicInfo.Title: No.6 1/2
ComicInfo.Summary:
(transcribed from inside cover:)
GORE SHRIEK 6 1/2 was created exclusively for GORE SHRIEK fans. This issue is available only from the artists or from FantaCo Enterprises Inc. No copies are available wholesale.
Credits/ Stories (transcribed directly from contents page):
COVER/ [CONTENTS]: Gurchain Singh
THE POSSE: Eric Stanway
SMOKE: Rolf Stark, Lettering/ Hank Jansen
ADDICTED TO DEATH: David MacDowell
INSIDE BACK COVER: Gurchain Singh
BACK COVER: Gurchain Singh
